achievements.name: Hydro Hunter
achievements.desc: Defeat every type of Hydro Mimic that an Oceanid can summon.

achievements.name: Dip, Duck, Dive, Dodge, Defeat
achievements.desc: Defeat an Oceanid without being hit by water bombs left behind by certain Hydro Mimics.

achievements.name: Extreme Gardening
achievements.desc: Paralyze a Cryo Regisvine by attacking its corolla.

achievements.name: Gardener Extraordinaire
achievements.desc: Paralyze a Pyro Regisvine by attacking its corolla.

achievements.name: Geronimo!
achievements.desc: Hit an opponent with a Plunging Attack after plunging for more than 5 seconds.

achievements.name: Shield Me From the World
achievements.desc: Have a single character be protected by 3 different types of shield at once.
